english.segment1: I lost my keys in the great unknown. And call me please. Cause I can't find my phone
english.segment2: (CHORUS). This is the stuff. That drives me crazy. This is the stuff. That's getting to me lately. In the middle of my little mess. I forget how big I'm blessed. This is the stuff. That gets under my skin. But I've gotta trust. You know exactly what Your doing. Might not be what I would choose. But this is the stuff You use
english.segment3: 45 in a 35. Sirens and fines. While I'm running behind
english.segment5: To break me of impatience. Conquer my frustrations. I've got a new appreciation. It's not the end of the world..
english.segment6: This is the stuff. That drives me crazy. This is the stuff. Someone save me. In the middle of my little mess. I forget how big I'm blessed. This is the stuff. That gets under my skin. But I've gotta trust. You know exactly what Your doing. Might not be what I would choose. But this is the stuff You use
